${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Cloud infrastructure for retail: SDN and network virtualization Digital transformation is a growing business imperative for retailers worldwide, and cloud computing has become a critical element in nearly all digital transformation strategies. As private cloud grows in importance, focus turns to network transformation in the datacenter, between datacenters, and out across the WAN. Software-defined networking (SDN) and network virtualization offer the means of supporting private and hybrid cloud infrastructure.
To learn more read IDC’s Technology Spotlight, “SDN and network virtualization <[[https://pages.nokia.com/2220.Gamechanger.IDC.Spotlight.html]]>".
